name: PICK A SIDE ROTATOR
description:
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON :  CLICK  AND CHOOSE

SPACE : ROTATE

ITS A HIGH SCORE BASED GAME WHERE YOU HAVE GIVEN OPTIONS TO  CHOOSE A SIDE TO ROTATE . WHICH EVER SIDE YOU WANT TO  ROTATE ALSO GIVS YOU A POWER UP

SCORE AS HIGH AS YOU CAN AND COMMENT YOUR SCORE IN THE DISCRIPTION
